statements: SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, energy_consumption FROM energy_audit_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT company_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM energy_audit_reports GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption > 1000 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, energy_consumption FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM energy_audit_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption, MAX(energy_consumption) AS max_consumption FROM energy_audit_reports;
SELECT DISTINCT company_id FROM energy_audit_reports ORDER BY company_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, company_name FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT company_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM audit_notes ORDER BY note_date ASC;
SELECT note_text, note_date FROM audit_notes WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, company_name, report_date, energy_consumed FROM energy_audit_reports;
SELECT company_name, energy_consumed, report_date, report_id FROM energy_audit_reports;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE report_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT company_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_audit_reports GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT e.report_id, e.company_name, e.report_date, e.energy_consumed, n.note_text, n.note_date FROM energy_audit_reports e JOIN audit_notes n ON e.report_id = n.report_id ORDER BY e.report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports;
SELECT company_name, auditor_name, audit_date FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption > 500;
SELECT report_id, energy_consumption FROM energy_audit_reports ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_details WHERE audit_section = 'Lighting';
SELECT progress_id, report_id, progress_date, reduction_percentage FROM energy_audit_progress;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports;
SELECT company_name, auditor_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption > 500;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_details WHERE audit_section = 'Lighting';
SELECT audit_description, findings FROM energy_audit_details WHERE report_id = 'c6fcab9d-48e5-4ee0-942a-d3b1a64b5d5e';
SELECT report_id, progress_date, reduction_percentage FROM energy_audit_progress ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports;
SELECT report_id, company_name FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT company_name, audit_date FROM energy_audit_reports ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_data WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT company_name, address, contact_name FROM company_information WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, energy_consumption FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT company_name, address FROM company_information WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT data_id, energy_type, energy_usage FROM audit_data WHERE energy_usage < 500;
SELECT * FROM progress_tracker WHERE progress_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports;
SELECT audit_id, company_name, audit_date FROM energy_audit_reports;
SELECT audit_id, company_name, energy_consumption_kwh FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption_kwh < 10000;
SELECT company_name, audit_date FROM energy_audit_reports ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, energy_reduction_goal FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_reduction_goal > 5000 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_audit_reports ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT company_name, energy_consumption_kwh FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption_kwh > 5000
SELECT company_name, industry_type FROM companies INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data ON companies.company_id = energy_consumption_data.company_id WHERE energy_usage_kwh < 500
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_result FROM audit_details WHERE audit_type = 'Internal' AND LENGTH(audit_result) > 50
SELECT company_name, savings_amount FROM companies INNER JOIN energy_savings ON companies.company_id = energy_savings.company_id WHERE savings_amount > 2000 ORDER BY savings_amount DESC
